content: . Administration of the drug in critically ill patients has been reported to lead to severe bradycardia which may result in death (34). The incidence of extracardiac side effects due to short-term administration of amiodarone is not well defined. However, most of the toxicity of the drug seems to be dose-dependant and related to chronic treatment (35).
